tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE print_media_issues (
  issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  publication_name VARCHAR(255),
  publication_date DATE,
  type ENUM('newspaper', 'magazine'),
  language VARCHAR(50),
  editor_name VARCHAR(100),
  is_archived BOOL
);

CREATE TABLE newspapers (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    issue_date DATE NOT NULL,
    publisher VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE magazines (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    issue_date DATE NOT NULL,
    editor VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE newspaper_articles (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    content TEXT,
    newspaper_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (newspaper_id) REFERENCES newspapers(id)
)

CREATE TABLE magazine_articles (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    content TEXT,
    magazine_id INT NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (magazine_id) REFERENCES magazines(id)
)

CREATE TABLE publication_authors (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    author_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL
)
